duties_responsibilities.duty: Contribute to all recruitment initiatives for Potbelly franchisees, including working with marketing department and ad agencies to design and implement recruitment campaigns.
Participate in various departments within the organization to ensure proper onboarding of new franchisee candidates.
Represent Potbelly at industry trade shows, seminars, social events, webinars, networking sessions, speaking engagements, etc.
Take the initial point on all franchisee leads and provide weekly pipeline reports to senior leadership.
Utilize CRM platform (FranConnect) to ensure proper documentation throughout the candidate qualification & onboarding process.
Conduct all in-person meetings, coordinate 'Discovery Day' activities, and provide guidance to franchisee candidates in the completion of business and marketing plans.
Lead franchisee candidates through the proper execution of all required documents and design and implement effective outreach campaigns to the franchise community.
Manage the franchise sales process to achieve quarterly and annual quotas and perform other related tasks as reasonably requested.
Analysis of specific selection and business challenges, and offer solutions based on best practices and business knowledge.
